The following glyphs have no outlines, but this is correct:
Monotype NULL (uni0000)
(uni000D)
SPACE (uni0020)
NO-BREAK SPACE (uni00A0)
ZERO WIDTH SPACE (uni200B)

Can not check, because no uni2005 in this font.

cmap

FEFF

cmap

00AD

Soft hyphen is often used in web and in professional print publishing software like Adobe InDesign.

This is a TTF, but this test is only for CFF fonts.

'NULL' (uni0000) (ID 1) = '0'.
'iivowelsigntamil' (uni0BC0) (ID 43) = '0'.
'viramatamil' (uni0BCD) (ID 52) = '0'.
'uni0951' (uni0951) (ID 221) = '0'.
'uni0952' (uni0952) (ID 222) = '0'.
'uni1CDA' (uni1CDA) (ID 225) = '0'.
'u1133C' (uni1133C) (ID 228) = '0'.
'uni200B' (uni200B) (ID 235) = '0'.
'uni200C' (uni200C) (ID 236) = '0'.
'uni200D' (uni200D) (ID 237) = '0'.

Error

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

glyf

advance width

Advance width should be zero.

The following glyphs (1) should have advance width 0:
'anusvaratamil' (uni0B82) (ID 4) = '360'.

Info

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Blk Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedBlack.ttf)

hmtx

advance

Pull glyphs with advance width zero.

'NULL' (uni0000) (ID 1) = '0'.
'iivowelsigntamil' (uni0BC0) (ID 43) = '0'.
'viramatamil' (uni0BCD) (ID 52) = '0'.

'uni200D' (uni200D) (ID 237) = '0'.

Error

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Blk Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedBlack.ttf)

'anusvaratamil' (uni0B82) (ID 4) = '370'.

The first four glyph indices are correct.

OS/2

table version 4.

'OS/2' table version should be 4.

OK: 'OS/2' table version is: 4.

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Thin Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedThin.ttf)

OS/2

useTypoMetrics

If the hhea metrics match the usWin metrics, it does not matter what the sTypo metrics are the fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False.

OK: fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False and is False.

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Thin Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedThin.ttf)

name and OS/2

MS and Mac NID 21/22 + WWS

If MS and Mac NID 21 and 22 is not set, 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True.

OK: Mac/Mac NID 21/22 is not set and 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS is True.

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Thin Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedThin.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Thin Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedThin.ttf)

OS/2

Panose Normal

Because 'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False the OS/2 panose array form flag should be a 'Normal' entry.

OK: 'OS/2' panose array form flag is a 'Normal' entry.

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Thin Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedThin.ttf)

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Blk Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedBlack.ttf)

OS/2

Panose Normal

Because 'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False the OS/2 panose array form flag should be a 'Normal' entry.

OK: 'OS/2' panose array form flag is a 'Normal' entry.

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Blk Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedBlack.ttf)

OS/2

usBreakChar

'OS/2' usBreakChar should be 0x0020.

OK: 'OS/2' usBreakChar is 0x0020.

Pass

OK: 'OS/2' usDefaultChar is 0x0000.

Error

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Blk Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedBlack.ttf)

OS/2

Embedding Level

For library fonts embedding level should be 'Preview & Print Embedding'.

Embedding Level is 'Embedding Level = Installable Embedding'. If custom font please check against job spec.

STAT table

STAT table

Info

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Thin Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedThin.ttf)

STAT

static font

Variable font must have a STAT table.

No check of STAT table for static fonts included, yet. Static fonts do not need to have a STAT table. It is only recommended by Microsoft, not required.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Info

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Thin Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2017 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

name

NID 4 length is '37' but shouldn't be longer than 31 characters.
'Noto Sans Tamil UI SemiCondensed Thin'

Warning

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Thin Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 4

If NID 2 is 'Regular': MS NID 4 = NID 1

NID 4 'Noto Sans Tamil UI SemiCondensed Thin' ≠ NID 1 'Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Thin'

name/head

MS NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 2.000;GOOG;noto-source:20170915:90ef993387c0' does match fontRevision 'Version 2.0'.

Error

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Thin Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '33' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedThin'

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Thin Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedThin', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Thin Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedThin', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Thin Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Thin Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedThin.ttf)

name

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Thin Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Thin Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Tamil UI SemiCondensed Thin' ≠ 'Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Thin' (NID 1).

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond ExtLt Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedExtraLight', Everything looks good.

Pass

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Noto is a trademark of Google Inc.'
but what do think about this
'Noto is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond ExtLt Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: MS NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Error

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond ExtLt Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 11

MS NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.google.com/get/noto/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond ExtLt Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.monotype.com/studio, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond ExtLt Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond ExtLt Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond ExtLt Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond ExtLt Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Tamil UI SemiCondensed ExtraLight' ≠ 'Noto Sans Tamil SemCond ExtLt' (NID 1).

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond ExtLt Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond ExtLt Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond ExtLt Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Check Width Names Typographic Family Name NID16

The width name should be before weight name. NID 16 is correct: 'Noto Sans Tamil UI'

Pass

MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Copyright 2017 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2017 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

'Noto Sans Tamil UI SemiCondensed Light'

Warning

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Light Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 4

NID 4 'Noto Sans Tamil UI SemiCondensed Light' ≠ NID 1 'Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Light'

name/head

MS NID 5

Error

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Light Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '34' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedLight'

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Light Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedLight', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Light Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedLight', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Light Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

name

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Light Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Light Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Light Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Light Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Tamil UI SemiCondensed Light' ≠ 'Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Light' (NID 1).

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Light Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2017 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '29' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensed'

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensed', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensed', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Tamil UI SemiCondensed' ≠ 'Noto Sans Tamil SemCond' (NID 1).

Pass

name

MS NID 0, Copyright.

MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2017 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Med Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '35' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedMedium'

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Med Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedMedium', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Med Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedMedium', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Med Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Med Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Med Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Med Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Tamil UI SemiCondensed Medium' ≠ 'Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Med' (NID 1).

Pass

MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2017 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond SemBd Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '37' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedSemiBold'

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond SemBd Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedSemiBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond SemBd Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedSemiBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond SemBd Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond SemBd Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond SemBd Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond SemBd Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Tamil UI SemiCondensed SemiBold' ≠ 'Noto Sans Tamil SemCond SemBd' (NID 1).

Pass

Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'No entry.'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'http://scripts.sil.org/OFL'

name

MS NID 0, Copyright.

MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2017 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Bold (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '33' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedBold'

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Bold (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Bold (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Bold (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Bold (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Bold (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Bold (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Tamil UI SemiCondensed Bold' ≠ 'Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Bold' (NID 1 + 'Space' + NID 2).

Pass

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2017 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

'NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedExtraBold'

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedExtraBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedExtraBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Tamil UI SemiCondensed ExtraBold' ≠ 'Noto Sans Tamil SemCond ExtBd' (NID 1).

Pass

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2017 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Blk Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '34' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedBlack'

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Blk Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedBlack', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Blk Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedBlack', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Blk Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Blk Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Blk Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Blk Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Tamil UI SemiCondensed Black' ≠ 'Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Blk' (NID 1).

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Thin Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedThin.ttf)

post

underline position and thickness

underlinePosition should be a negative and underlineThickness not 0 or negative.

underlinePosition is '-100'.
underlineThicknes is '50'.

Pass

underlineThicknes is '50'.

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Med Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedMedium.ttf)

post

underlinePosition is '-100'.
underlineThicknes is '50'.

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Pass

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Thin Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedThin.ttf)

GPOS

kern

Simple check if kern feature in GPOS table.

The font has GPOS kerning.

Info

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Thin Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedThin.ttf)

kern

-/-

Check if 'kern' table in font.

Font has no 'kern' table. Please verify if font requires kern table or if only GPOS kerning should be in font.

Info

Noto Sans Tamil SemCond Thin Regular (NotoSansTamilUI-SemiCondensedThin.ttf)

Font has GPOS kerning and no 'kern' table.

Pass

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

GSUB

sinf

If there is a feature subs, then the sinf feature should be there, too. Otherwise InDesign will mark it not existing.

There is a subs feature in the font, but the sinf is missing. Please investigate.
